com.sillysoft.lux.util
Class CountryStack

java.lang.Object
  com.sillysoft.lux.util.CountryStack
Direct Known Subclasses:
CountryPathStack
public class CountryStack
extends java.lang.Object

This is an implementation of a stack. You can add to the top, or add with a value. If added with a (int) value then the the added item will be sorted into the correct place in the stack.

It can use CountryElement as its member type. There is a CountryPathStack subclass that extends it to allow each unit to be a list of Country's.

You can pop from the front.
